definitions.title: n.pr.m. 1.
definitions.body: head of a family that returned with Zerubbabel Ne 7:15 (= [[בָּנִי]] ‖ Ezr 2:10 & perh. Ezr 10:34 cf. Sm:Listen 14; but BeRy prop. here [[בִּגְוַי]]).

a Levite of Ezra's time Ezr 8:33, Ne 10:10 (prop. = [[בָּנִי]] Ne 8:7, [[בֻּנִּי]] Ne 9:4) Ne 12:8 cf. Ne 3:24 ([[בַּוַי]], text. err. v:Ne 3:18) v. BeRy; also Ezr 2:40 = Ne 7:43 [[לִבְּנֵי]] rd. perh. [[לְבִנֻּי]] cf. Sm:Listen 16 but BeRy otherwise; cf. further Gr:Gesch.ii.2, 389.
